Pilates Instructor, Aesthetician, Quantum Healer,  Wellness Coach
Sanctuary on Camelback Resort and Spa & Kai-Zen: A Creating Wellness Center

I currently work as a  Wellness Coach at Sanctuary Resort and Spa as well as "Kai Zen"  Wellness Center in Scottsdale Arizona, My goal is to first and foremost empower my clients by teaching them how to "Create" awareness and  build a strong mind, and  body connection through unique Healing Therapies such as : Pilates, Yoga, Aesthetics and Quantum Healing Energy Therapy.
The Phoenician Resort and Spa, Starwood Hotels

The Phoenician Resort and Spa, Starwood Hotels and Resorts offered me the knowledge, guidance, inspiration and passion I needed in order to succeed in the marvelous and unique world of high end and elite resorts.I will forever be grateful for the immense experience and knowledge I was very lucky to gain from working for Starwood Hotels and Resorts.
Sanctuary On Camelback Resort and Spa

Train, Coach guide a Staff of 10++ Aestheticians, Create Treatment Protocols, Enforce 5 Star Standards, Provide exceptional Aesthetics Services in the treatment room. Exceed Product Retail Sales, Choose, research product lines.
Worked as an Aesthetician, Part-time at the Agave Spa. While working at the Sanctuary Spa at the same time.

summary: My Goal, Vision, and Purpose as a  Wellness Coach, Quantum Healer and Human Being, is to  create a Strong "Human Connection"​ with my Clients, my Co-Workers, My Community and every single person I come in contact with.Our "Wealth is Our Health"​ and it should be our #1 Priority.Having a strong, Fit  Body is important, however having a Strong Mind  and Body is even better!Our Mind and Body are a Temple, which stores all the Wisdom, Inner Strength, Creativity, Passion and all the Inspiration we need in order to "Create"​ the Life we Desire.Our Bodies have the ability to heal and regenerate themselves, unfortunately we forget how powerful we really are, and forget how to "Access"​ such powerful Inner Strength and  Wisdom laying dormant in our Mind, Body and Spirit.It is through my "Positive Intention"​ and the help of my knowledge in  Yoga, Pilates, Aesthetics, Quantum Energy Healing, and many more Unique and Regenerative healing modalities, that I am able to guide, coach, nurture and "​ Empower"​ my Clients."Open your Heart, Open Your Mind, Set your Intention, Smile and Let's Create Magic"                                                                                                                          Shuli
